charts.title: Change Management Process Speed: Tech vs. Construction
charts.value: This bar chart visually emphasizes the stark contrast in turnaround times between tech industry changes (hours to days) and the significantly longer process in construction (weeks, potentially months). It reinforces the core argument of the blog post by showcasing the key difference in agility.

data.label: Tech Industry Change (e.g., bug fix)
data.description: Rapid iteration and deployment are common.

data.label: Construction Change Order
data.description: Involves extensive documentation, negotiation, and potential disputes.

charts.title: Construction Change Order Process Steps
charts.value: This flowchart visually maps out the multi-step process involved in a construction change order, making the complexity and length of the process clear to readers. This visualization makes the abstract concept concrete and helps readers understand why it's so vastly different from tech's agile processes.

data.label: Request Submitted
data.description: Initiation of the change order process.

data.label: Review and Evaluation
data.description: Assessment of the change's impact and feasibility.

data.label: Negotiation and Approval
data.description: Agreement on cost, timeline, and other terms.

data.label: Documentation and Legal Review
data.description: Formalizing the changes in legally binding documents.

data.label: Final Inspection and Payment
data.description: Verification of completion and final settlement.
